html:
Behold the Lord hath a mighty and strong one "Behold the mighty one, the exceedingly strong one"— ,לאדני אמץ ,ammits ladonai ,, fortis Domino ,, i.e., fortissimmus, a Hebraism. For ,לאדני ,ladonai ,, to the Lord, thirty-eight MSS. Of Dr. Kennicott's and many of De Rossi's, with some of my own, and two editions, read ,ליהוה ,laihovah ,, to Jehovah.

,
